alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:42AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Robeson, Dillon, northeastern Darlington and Marlboro Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1042 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Laurinburg to Swift Creek. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Bennettsville, Hartsville, Dillon, Darlington, Red Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Maxton, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Latta, Rowland, Lake View, Clio, Rex, Hamer, Brownsville, Swift Creek, and Shannon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 176 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
